description: Student teacher at Risa and Ootani`s school. Maitake, who prefers the nickname "Maity" or "Mighty", is taller than Risa and extraordinarily good-looking. He bears a resemblance to "Cain-sama", a character in one of Risa`s favorite visual novels, and soon acquires a legion of female fans.
name: Maitake Kuniumi
